org.cleverbus.spi.msg
Interface MessageService

All Known Implementing Classes:
MessageServiceImpl
public interface MessageService

Service for manipulating with Message.

Author:
Petr Juza

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

insertMessages

void insertMessages(Collection<Message> messages)
Inserts new messages.

Parameters:
messages - the collection of message

setStateOk

void setStateOk(@Header(value="processingMessage")
                Message msg,
                @Properties
                Map<String,Object> props)
Changes state of the message to MsgStateEnum.OK.

If message is child message then method checks if all child messages of the parent message aren't processed.

Parameters:
msg - the message
props - the exchange properties [property name; property value]

setStateProcessing

void setStateProcessing(Message msg)
Changes state of the message to MsgStateEnum.PROCESSING.

Parameters:
msg - the message

setStateWaiting

void setStateWaiting(@Header(value="processingMessage")
                     Message msg)
Changes state of the message to MsgStateEnum.WAITING - only if the message hasn't been already processed.

Parameters:
msg - the message

setStateWaitingForResponse

void setStateWaitingForResponse(@Header(value="processingMessage")
                                Message msg)
Changes state of the message to MsgStateEnum.WAITING_FOR_RES.

Parameters:
msg - the message

setStatePartlyFailedWithoutError

void setStatePartlyFailedWithoutError(@Header(value="processingMessage")
                                      Message msg)
Changes state of the message to MsgStateEnum.PARTLY_FAILED but without increasing error count.

Parameters:
msg - the message

setStatePartlyFailed

void setStatePartlyFailed(@Header(value="processingMessage")
                          Message msg,
                          Exception ex,
                          @Property(value="exceptionErrorCode")@Nullable
                          ErrorExtEnum errCode,
                          @Property(value="customData")@Nullable
                          String customData,
                          @Properties
                          Map<String,Object> props)
Changes state of the message to MsgStateEnum.PARTLY_FAILED.

Parameters:
msg - the message
ex - the exception
errCode - the error code that can be explicitly defined if needed
customData - the custom data
props - the exchange properties [property name; property value]

setStateFailed

void setStateFailed(@Header(value="processingMessage")
                    Message msg,
                    Exception ex,
                    @Property(value="exceptionErrorCode")@Nullable
                    ErrorExtEnum errCode,
                    @Property(value="customData")@Nullable
                    String customData,
                    @Properties
                    Map<String,Object> props)
Changes state of the message to MsgStateEnum.FAILED.

If message is child message then parent message will be marked as failed too.

Parameters:
msg - the message
ex - the exception
errCode - the error code that can be explicitly defined if needed
customData - the custom data
props - the exchange properties [property name; property value]

setStateFailed

void setStateFailed(Message msg,
                    ErrorExtEnum errCode,
                    String errDesc)
Changes state of the message to MsgStateEnum.FAILED.

If message is child message then parent message will be marked as failed too.

Parameters:
msg - the message
errCode - the error code
errDesc - the error description

findMessageById

@Nullable
Message findMessageById(Long msgId)
Finds message by message ID.

Parameters:
msgId - the message ID
Returns:
message or null if not found message with specified ID

findEagerMessageById

@Nullable
Message findEagerMessageById(Long msgId)
Finds message by message ID with eager loading.

Parameters:
msgId - the message ID
Returns:
message or null if not found message with specified ID

findMessageByCorrelationId

@Nullable
Message findMessageByCorrelationId(String correlationId,
                                            @Nullable
                                            ExternalSystemExtEnum systemEnum)
Finds message by message external system and correlation Id. If system parameter is null then messages are searched by correlation id only.

Parameters:
correlationId - the correlation ID
systemEnum - the external system
Returns:
message or null if not found message with specified correlation ID

findMessagesByContent

List<Message> findMessagesByContent(String substring)
Finds message by substring in payload property.

Parameters:
substring - the substring of payload property
Returns:
list of messages or empty list if not found messages with substring in payload property

getCountMessages

int getCountMessages(MsgStateEnum state,
                     @Nullable
                     Integer interval)
Get count of messages in specific state.

Parameters:
state - State of message
interval - searching messages updated after this interval (in seconds)
Returns:
count of messages

getCountProcessingMessagesForFunnel

int getCountProcessingMessagesForFunnel(String funnelValue,
                                        int idleInterval,
                                        String funnelCompId)
Get count of processing messages for specified funnel value and funnel ID.

Parameters:
funnelValue - the funnel value
idleInterval - interval (in seconds) that determines how long can be message processing
funnelCompId - the funnel component ID
Returns:
count of processing messages

getMessagesForGuaranteedOrderForRoute

List<Message> getMessagesForGuaranteedOrderForRoute(String funnelValue,
                                                    boolean excludeFailedState)
Gets list of messages with specified funnel value for guaranteed processing order of whole routes.

Parameters:
funnelValue - the funnel value
excludeFailedState - FAILED state is used by default; use true if you want to exclude FAILED state
Returns:
list of messages ordered by message timestamp

getMessagesForGuaranteedOrderForFunnel

List<Message> getMessagesForGuaranteedOrderForFunnel(String funnelValue,
                                                     int idleInterval,
                                                     boolean excludeFailedState,
                                                     String funnelCompId)
Gets list of messages with specified funnel value for guaranteed processing order of messages for specified funnel.

Parameters:
funnelValue - the funnel value
idleInterval - interval (in seconds) that determines how long can message be processing
excludeFailedState - FAILED state is used by default; use true if you want to exclude FAILED state
funnelCompId - the funnel component ID
Returns:
list of messages ordered by message timestamp

setStatePostponed

void setStatePostponed(@Header(value="processingMessage")
                       Message msg)
Changes state of the message to MsgStateEnum.POSTPONED.

Parameters:
msg - the message

setFunnelComponentId

void setFunnelComponentId(Message msg,
                          String funnelCompId)
Sets funnel component identifier to specified message.

Parameters:
msg - the message
funnelCompId - the funnel component ID
